body:
Basic guide: [The Universal Declaration of Human Rights](http://www.un.org/en/documents/udhr/index.shtml) (the UN), [The Universal Declaration on Cultural Diversity](http://www2.ohchr.org/english/law/diversity.htm) (UNESCO). State parties, [which ratified](http://www.unesco.org/eri/la/convention.asp?KO=31038&language=E&order=alpha) the Convention 2005 ([on the Protection and Promotion of the Diversity of Cultural Expressions](http://unesdoc.unesco.org/images/0014/001429/142919e.pdf)), have its the obligations in the scope of this issue (national and international). The such obligations are directed for the good of the civil society and copyright holders. [Songs](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_The_Beatles_songs) of band [The Beatles](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Beatles) can be used in the [projects of Wikimedia Foundation](http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Our_projects) under the license, who is located in several [relevant](https://github.com/emi/emi.github.com/issues/2) places ([CC BY-SA 3.0](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/)): in the [official community](http://my.mail.ru/community/beatles-gold-tv/131D0B9D72565564.html) of the band, including. Note: the materials, which are located in [The Beatles Coalition for Cultural Diversity](http://my.mail.ru/community/beatles-gold-tv/131D0B9D72565564.html) (video and images).

BEATLES-ED@LONDON.COM
----------
POST@APPLECORPSLTD.COM

name: Music of band The Beatles for Education
